entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
